channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside dexter apartments, 24th December
item.description:
Multiple dog fouling all outside dexter apartments going up to the cafe . Very disgusting to see. Sickening to walk with children on this road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 97, Queen's Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bike left for over 8 months, 24th December
item.description:
The light Blue Bike has been left locked up for well over 8months. Staff at the restaurant infront of the lock can confirm. it takes up parking space for other cyclists and sometimes causes blockages on pavement

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London

item.title: Someone dropping dog poo bags along pathway, 24th December
item.description:
Just recently (over the past couple of weeks) someone is persistently dropping dog poo bags along Cheveney Walk, primarily towards the cycle prevention barrier but also further along. 7 bags counted today, please see attached photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Forstal Close, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: MBRU’s return to occupy regular pitch, 24th December
item.description:
After 1 week of leaving the area new signs have been put up and existing ones cleaned. Sadly, the MBRU’s (Mobile Bike Repair Units) have returned to take their usual pitch. These units continuously alternate parking positions to give false sense of movement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fielding Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish still not collected - Chart St., 24th December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Buttesland Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Likely watermain broken in pavement, 24th December
item.description:

item.title: Fallen leaves covering footpath, 24th December
item.description:
This time of year the footpath gets very narrow due to fallen leaves, they are very slippery to walk on. This is a busy walkway to the shops, used by a lot of people, including elderly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Squirrels Close, White Oak, Swanley
